import React, { lazy, useState} from 'react' import { CButton, CCard, CCardTitle, CCardBody, CCol, CFormFloating, CFormInput, CFormLabel, CFormSelect, CRow, CForm, } from '@coreui/react' const addApartment = (props) => { const[aptno, setAptNo] = useState(); const[blockno, setBlockNo] = useState(); const[roomcnt, setRoomCnt] = useState(); const[fstatus, setFStatus] = useState(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const apartmentInfo = {aptno, blockno, roomcnt, fstatus}; fetch('http://localhost:8080/createApartment', { method:'POST', mode: 'no-cors', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'cache-control': 'no-cache', 'Access-Control-Request-Headers':'*', 'Access-Control-Request-Method':'*' }, body: JSON.stringify(apartmentInfo) }).then(() => { console.log(apartmentInfo); }) } return (

Add Apartment

Fill Apartment Details setAptNo(e.target.value)} type="integer" id="aptNo"/> Apartment Number setBlockNo(e.target.value)} type="text" id="blockNo"/> Block Number setRoomCnt(e.target.value)} type="integer" id="roomCount"/> Room Count setFStatus(e.target.value)} id="furniture"> Furniture Status Submit
) } export default addApartment;
